hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime BTC Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a NEUTRAL regime (confidence >60%) with 10-day historical volatility dropping below 40% and 20-day Bollinger Band width contracting to <0.15, a breakout above the 20-day upper Bollinger Band will lead to a regime transition to BULL within 5 trading days with >70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes with compressed volatility often precede significant directional moves. Breakouts from tight ranges in crypto tend to sustain as liquidity follows the initial move. Current market shows signs of compression after recent consolidation.

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price closes below 20-day moving average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain, price returns inside BB within 2 days, or regime transitions to BEAR instead of BULL.
